name: Just Swinging It
description:
The name of the game is simple: 

Move with the 'Arrow Keys'

Press 'Space' to swing your sword

Fight off waves of ninjas and try to reach a new high score! 

Holding down 'Space' will charge your attack, rewarding you extra points. The more swords you have on the screen, the more points you have as well. Good luck!

Link to GitHub repo: https://github.com/peow2373/ShmupProject
